title: Introduced animals of New Zealand

description: The vast number of imported deer, chamois, that, pigs, goats, wallabies, opossums, rabbits and hares with no natural enemies tends to denude the New Zealand countryside of natural forest and plant protection resulting in erosion off hillsides and flooding of lower farm lands.
